loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
The moment Olga started a family, she has always been looking for ways to support her husband with the costs of living; she became involved in various activities to generate extra income in order to provide their eight children domestic peace, security, and well-being. She noticed that her neighborhood lacked small grocery stores and decided to invest a bit of her savings to open up one. This small business has allowed her to cover food costs for her dear children. She believes that increasing the variety of products and merchandise will ultimately be useful to her family. While she dedicates her time running the store and taking care of her children, her husband Lorenzo works at an auto mechanic shop. The couple hopes to leave most of their inheritance to their children and their education. To materialize their plans, Olga requests a loan that will be well invested.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Translator.

Desde que formó su familia doña Olga, siempre buscó la manera de apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar, desenvolviéndose en diversas actividades para tratar de generar ingresos extras a fin de brindar a sus ocho hijos tranquilidad, seguridad y bienestar.Observó que en su zona de vivienda no existían muchas tienditas de abarrotes y decidió invertir el poco ahorro que tenia para aperturar e implementar su tiendita, este pequeño negocio le está permitiendo cubrir los gastos de alimentación de sus queridos hijos, ella cree que aumentando la variedad y el stock de su mercadería podrá obtener mejores utilidades para su familia.Mientras ella se dedica al cuidado y atención de sus hijos y de su tiendita, su esposo Lorenzo por su parte trabaja en un taller de mecánica, juntos con mucho esfuerzo pretenden dejarles la mejor herencia a sus hijos, su educación. Para concretar sus planes doña Olga requiere obtener un préstamo de dinero que será muy bien invertido.

loans.use: to buy a variety of goods of basic needs at wholesale prices for her small store

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Fifty year old Dominga has always been a very hard working business woman. She started her commercial work selling clothes in the streets of the city of Juliaca. That activity allowed her to give an education to her only daughter, Luz who is now grown and independent. Currently Dominga offers hats (traditional Peruvian chullos, with the flaps over the ears), sweaters, pants, etc. at the Rinconada mine. She wants to increase her volume of products in order to market them and she estimates that with this capital investment she will strengthen her business and improve her home and her quality of life. Let's make her Dominga's desires a reality.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

La señora Dominga de 50 años de edad siempre fue una mujer trabajadora y de negocio, inició su labor comercial vendiendo ropa americana en forma ambulatoria en la ciudad de Juliaca, esta actividad le permitió brindarle educación a su única hija Luz, quien ahora es ya mayor e independiente, actualmente doña Dominga viene ofreciendo chullos, chompas, pantalones, etc. en la mina Rinconada. Desea aumentar el volumen de productos para comercializarlos y estima que con un ingreso de dinero como capital de inversión fortalecerá su negocio y mejorará su vivienda y calidad de vida.Hagamos realidad los deseos de doña Dominga.

loans.use: Increase of capital to strengthen her business and improve her business.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
We find 62 year old María in her small home happily preparing her delicious and varied potajes (vegetable stews, often made with chick peas) so that she can later sell them in the Laguna Terminal market in the city of Juliaca. She is the mother of two children, 26 and 20 years old, who support her unconditionally in her noble labor. For many years she worked as a craftswoman, but her agility and skill for weaving chompas (typical garments of Peru) decreased as she grew older. For this reason she decided to dedicate herself to selling prepared foods. The business is bringing her a good income and with her earnings she plans to renovate her small house, a project that has been waiting for years. To finalize her plans she wants to obtain a loan which she will invest innthe repair of her home. With your unselfish support she will be able to finalize her project in a very short time.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

Encontramos a doña Maria de 62 años de edad en su pequeño domicilio preparando muy contenta sus deliciosos y variados potajes para luego ponerlos en venta en el mercado, Laguna Temporal de la ciudad de Juliaca. Ella es madre de dos hijos de 26 y 20 años de edad quienes la apoyan incondicionalmente en su noble labor.Ella durante muchos años estaba dedicada a la labor artesanal, pero su agilidad y habilidad para el tejido de chompas fueron disminuyendo conforme pasaban los años, por esa razón es que decidió dedicarse a la venta de comida, esta actividad le viene generando buenos ingresos y con las ganancias que ha ido obteniendo tiene pensado refaccionar su casita que por muchos años ha estado suspendida.Para concretar sus planes desea obtener un préstamo de dinero que tiene pensado invertir en el arreglo de su vivienda. Con tu apoyo desinteresado en muy corto tiempo podrá concretar su proyecto.

loans.use: Renovation of her small house.

loans.name: Martha Rosa

texts.es:
Cheese selling is now how Rosa, a determined 23 year old eager to progress, earns her living. She started working in this business two years ago. She began by helping her older brothers, but when she saw her own skill and quickness closing sales, she decided to make cheese sales her primary source of income. Rosa buys her merchandise during the weekends in various small villages surrounding Juliaca, the city where she lives. Later she she sells them wholesale in the market of the city of Arequipa where she has a large clientele. The sales of fresh and tasty cheeses has allowed her to satisfactorily pay for her accounting studies. Her desire is to have more capital in order to invest it in her business. For this reason, she turns to your good heart and requests a loan she commits to repaying in 6 months.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

La actividad de venta de quesos se ha convertido en el sustento principal de Rosa, joven empeñosa de 23 años de edad con muchísimas ganas de progresar, se viene dedicando a este oficio hace dos años y se inició apoyando a sus hermanos mayores, pero al observar su destreza y rapidez para concretar cada una de las ventas decidió hacer de este oficio su principal ingreso económico.Rosa, adquiere su mercadería los fines de semana en los diferentes pueblitos aledaños de la ciudad donde vive, Juliaca, para luego enviarlas al por mayor al mercado de la ciudad de Arequipa donde tiene gran clientela.Esta actividad de compra y venta de agradables y frescos quesos le está permitiendo cubrir satisfactoriamente sus estudios de contabilidad y su deseo es contar con mayor capital para invertirlos en esta actividad, para eso recurre a tu buen corazón y hace la petición de un préstamo, dinero que se compromete a reembolsarlo en un lapso de seis meses.

loans.use: Increase of capital to invest in offering a greater number of cheeses

loans.name: Víctor

texts.es:
On of the busiest avenues of the city of Juliaca we find Victor, very happy to be providing his service of cell phone calls to the population. He starts his work at 7 in the morning and finishes at 8 at night, every day of the week. He carries out his work with a lot of joy. He feels very satisfied because in a very little time he has accomplished the short-term objectives he had drawn up for himself. Before starting the business, Victor was studying to be a mechanic in a private vocational school, but his lack of economic resources forced him to abandon his studies. Now, with great expectations in his work and his professional life, he wishes to continue prospering. To achieve this he is willing to invest all of his effort. He is thinking about acquiring another cell phone. With this purpose in mind, he turns to your good disposition and requests a loan to make the goals he has set for himself a reality. Victor anxiously awaits your response.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

En una D. las avenidas más concurridas D. L. ciudad D. Juliaca encontramos muy contento a Víctor, brindando sus servicios D. llamadas móviles a L. población. Él inicia su labor a las 7:00 D. L. mañana y L. culmina a las 8:00 D. L. noche, durante todos los días D. L. semana; esta actividad que desempeña con mucha alegría le viene generando muchas satisfacciones porque en corto tiempo ha logrado alcanzar los objetivos que se había trazado a corto plazo. Anteriormente Víctor estudiaba L. carrera técnica D. Mecánica en un instituto privado, pero por sus bajos recursos económicos se vio en L. necesidad D. abandonarlos; ahora con muchas expectativas en su trabajo y en su vida profesional, desea seguir prosperando, para lograrlo está dispuesto a esforzarse mucho más y tiene pensado adquirir otra herramienta D. comunicación. Con ese prepósito recurre a tu buena disposición y hace L. solicitud D. un préstamo a fin D. cristalizar las metas que se ha propuesto. Víctor espera ansioso tu respuesta.

loans.use: Purchase of an additional work tool in order to expand his services.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda's Internet cafe is the most popular in the area. She decided to invest her savings in this business. In the beginning, it didn't look as though it would be very profitable, since lots of competition exists right in her area. Fortunately, the good, quick service that Hilda provides has allowed her to win a large number of clients in a very short time. Hilda feels a special affection for her business because her earnings allow her to provide well-being and most importantly, an education to her two youngest children. This resolute and cheerful mother's wish is to perform appropriate maintenance on her computers. With this purpose in mind, she turns to your generous heart and requests the loan that will allow her to fulfill her wish. Let's make Hilda's request a reality.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

Las cabinas de Internet de la señora Hilda, son las más concurridas de su zona. Ella decidió invertir el ahorro que tenia en esta actividad, en un principio no parecía ser muy rentable porque en esa zona existía mucha competencia, afortunadamente el buen y rápido servicio que brinda le ha permitido captar en muy corto tiempo gran cantidad de clientes. Por este su negocio doña Hilda siente un cariño especial, debido a que con sus ganancias le permite brindar a sus dos hijos menores bienestar y sobre todo educación. El deseo de esta empeñosa y alegre madre es darle un mantenimiento adecuado a sus computadoras, con ese propósito recurre a tu generoso corazón y hace la solicitud de un préstamo para llevar a cabo su deseo. Hagamos realidad la petición de Hilda.

loans.use: Perform maintenance on her computers in order to improve her services

loans.name: Melecia

texts.es:
Her shop of spare parts and motorcycle workshop is the most important economic deposit according to the family of Mrs. Melecia. She decided to undertake this business as a result of her husband Maximo who works in a motorcycle workshop and thanks to her perseverence and interest learned quite quickly in this occupation. For around a year and a half her three sons have been working in this business in spite of their young age and they work very hard at this occupation. The dream of this family is to have the largest and most well known workshop of motorcycle repair and small parts in the city of Juliaca, with this they will try to provide the best and most optimal service for their customers. In order to obtain what they long for they need to obtain a loan that will be invested into purchasing a wider variety of spare parts for motorcycles. Melecia has promised to return the loan within six months. Collaborate with this noble mother, she will not be fraudulent.

Translated from Spanish by Chloé Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

Su tienda de repuestos y taller de motos es el ingreso económico más importante con el que cuenta la familia de la señora Melecia. Ella decidió emprender este negocio a raíz de que su esposo Máximo trabajaba en un taller de motos y gracias a su perseverancia e interés aprendió rápidamente ese oficio.Viene funcionando su negocio alrededor de un año y medio en este periodo sus tres hijos a pesar de su corta edad ya se desenvuelven muy bien en este oficio.El sueño que tiene esta familia es hacer de su tienda de repuestos y taller de motos el más grande y reconocido de la ciudad de Juliaca, con ese fin tratan de brindar un buen y óptimo servicio a sus clientes. Para concretar sus anhelos además requiere obtener un préstamo de dinero el cual pretende invertir en la compra de mayor variedad de repuestos para motos, Melecia se compromete en retornar el préstamo en un lapso de seis meses.Colabore con esta noble madre, no lo defraudará.

loans.use: Purchase a wider variety of spare parts for motorcycles

loans.name: María

texts.es:
Mrs. Maria has always been very good at business, her diligence and perseverence has allowed her success in each activity that she occupied. For the last few month she decided to establish a business selling fuel and gas, materials that she gets from the border with Bolivia and that she sells to a select customer base in the city of Juliaca. With this new activity she has been able to proviD. better for her family. She is a mother of four sons, two of which are dependent on her, her husbands sells cookies/biscuits and candy, mostly to various cities in the area surrounding Puno. The dream of these hardworking parents is to proviD. a good education and good example for their sons so they will become valuable professionals in the future. With this opportunity Maria is asking for a loan which she plans to invest in her shop, and with this business considerably improve their living conditions. Maria and her family are hoping for your prompt response.

Translated from Spanish by Chloé Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

La señora María, siempre fue una mujer D. negocios, su diligencia y perseverancia la llevaron a tener éxito en cada actividad que ha desempeñado; hace sólo algunos meses decidió incursionar en el negocio D. venta D. combustible y gas, mercadería que trae D. la frontera con Bolivia y los venD. a su selecta clientela en la ciudad D. Juliaca, con esta nueva actividad está logrando conseguir mejores utilidades para su familia.Ella es madre D. cuatro hijos dos D. ellos aún dependientes, su esposo trabaja vendiendo galletas y golosinas al por mayor en las distintas ciudades del departamento D. Puno. El deseo que tienen estos laboriosos padres es brindarles una buena educación y ejemplo a sus hijos para que en el futuro sean hombres profesionales con buenos valores.En esta oportunidad Maria solicita un préstamo D. dinero que tiene proyectado invertir en su mercadería, considera que con este negocio logrará mejorar considerablemente su condición D. vida.María y su familia esperan tu pronta respuesta.

loans.use: Increase of capital in order to offer larger quantities of fuel

loans.name: María Antonia

texts.es:
Mrs. Antonia comes from a humble family. She, as well as her brothers had many difficulties to move forward, and with much strength and will was able to set up a tire changing shop. This activity also provided her with the opportunity to provide individual economic investments for her younger brothers who support her in caring for and providing attention to her business and to her young two year old daughter named Mercy. Presently, Antonia is living in a rented home, her dream is to build a small home which she will share with her daughter and younger brother in a stable and safe location. She is appealing to your good and generous heart and is asking for a loan which she promises to reimburse within six month in order to acquire larger quantities of tools for her small workshop. Thank you for your kind collaboration so that Antonia can accomplish her goals.

Translated from [language] by Chloé Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Antonia proviene de una familia humilde ella al igual que sus hermanos tuvo muchas dificultades para salir adelante, con mucho esfuerzo y voluntad logró poner su vulcanizadora de llantas, con esta actividad también les está dando la oportunidad de obtener ingresos económicos propios a sus hermanos menores quienes la apoyan en el cuidado y atención de su negocio y la de su pequeña niña Mercy de 2 años de edad.Actualmente Antonia viene viviendo en un domicilio alquilado, su deseo es construir su casita, con el fin de compartir con su hija y hermanos menores un lugar seguro y estable.Con ese propósito recurre a tu buen y generoso corazón y hace la petición de un préstamo que se compromete a retornar en un lapso de seis meses a fin de adquirir mayor cantidad de herramientas para su pequeño taller.Gracias a tu gentil colaboración Antonia podrá cumplir con sus objetivos.

loans.use: Purchase tools in order to provide better and faster service for her customers

loans.name: Miriam Josefina

texts.es:
Mrs. Josefina has always been a hard worker, a few years ago an unfortunate and tragic accident occurred and she lost her husband in a transportation accident. This cause her much pain because her three lovely daughters were very small. Since then they have given her enough strength for her to obtain various occupations and convert herself into both mother and father for her children, always looking out for their well-being, security and education. Presently, this adorable mother lives in a family home where she works from very early in the morning producing ducts/gutters for roofs of homes. This occupation of manual labor that she realizes with her skills and working hands enables her to provide an education for her lovely daughters. Additionally, she sells candy, American clothes and vegetables, among others. Her wish is to expand the production of ducts/gutters and it is for this reason that she is soliciting your help in order to acquire the necessary materials to realize this goal. Josefina and her lovely daughters are appreciative of your hear and your kind collaboration.

Translated from Spanish by Chloé Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Josefina siempre fue una mujer muy trabajadora, hace algunos años desafortunadamente ocurrió una gran tragedia, perdió a su esposo en un fatídico accidente de tránsito, hecho que le causó mucho dolor puesto que en ese entonces sus tres queridas hijas aún eran muy pequeñas; desde entonces sus retoños le dieron suficientes fuerzas para que se desenvuelva en diferentes oficios convirtiéndose en padre y madre de sus hijos, velando siempre por su bienestar, seguridad y educación.Actualmente esta adorable madre vive en un domicilio familiar en donde trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana realizando canaletas de calamina para los techos de las viviendas, este oficio que desempeña manualmente con sus hábiles y trabajadoras manos le están permitiendo ofrecerles educación a sus queridas hijas. Adicionalmente a esta labor vende golosinas, ropas americanas, verduras entre otros. Su deseo es incrementar la producción de sus canaletas y por esta razón solicita de vuestra ayuda a fin de adquirir el material necesario para alcanzar este objetivo.Josefina y sus queridas niñas agradecen de corazón tu gentil colaboración.

loans.use: Purchase large quantities of materials to produce ducts/gutters

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
Elsa is 43 years old and is a valiant mother who, due to adversities which touched her life, is eager to move forward. For the last few years she has suffered from thefts in her home and her business [buying and selling of gold] had to be abandoned, leaving her in a very bad economical condition. To add to this unfortunate series of events her husband abandoned her, leaving her alone to care for their young boys. Since then she decided to begin fresh, with all of the eagerness, strength and insistence that characterizes her, in order to obtain what she wants. She opened a small grocery store which also offers a phone calling service, a strategy that was very important in oder to attract more customers. Finally this persistent mother with much dilligence and strength is concretely achieveing one of her dreams, establishing a hardware store that sells construction materials. She is certain that this business will provide her dear sons with professional careers, a thought that motivates her to push forward. Elsa's desire is to obtain a loan which will permit her to expand this business. Your investment will not be wasted in the hand of this dilligent and valiant mother.

Translated from Spanish by Chloé Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

Elsa de 43 años de edad es una valerosa madre que a pesar de las adversidades que le ha tocado vivir sigue deseosa de salir adelante; desdichadamente hace algunos años sufrió un robo en su domicilio y su negocio de compra y venta de oro tuvo que ser abandonado, este hecho la dejo en muy mala condición económica, para finalizar su infortunio su esposo la abandonó dejándola sola con sus dos menores hijos.Desde entonces decidió empezar de nuevo, con el mismo ahínco, fuerza y empeño que le caracteriza para lograr lo que quiere. Aperturó su pequeña tiendita de abarrotes, en ella también brindaba servicio de llamadas telefónicas al público, estrategia que fue muy importante para captar más clientes, finalmente esta empeñosa madre con mucha diligencia y esfuerzo está logrando concretas uno de sus sueños, poner su gran ferretería, está segura que con este negocio podrá brindarles carreras profesionales a sus queridos hijos quienes en todo momento la motivaron para seguir adelante.El deseo de doña Elsa es adquirir un préstamo de dinero que le permitirá implementar aún más su negocio.Tu inversión no será malgastada en las manos de esta diligente y valerosa madre.

loans.use: Deposit in order to establish a small hardware store that sells construction materials

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Mrs Magdalena’s grocery store is small, but very well supplied. That is why it is one of the busiest stores in the area.

The store belonged to Magdalena’s older sister but when she moved to another city, she transferred it to Magdalena.

Magdalena has been in charge of the store for 2 years now and she would like to further expand it. She wants to sell vegetables, fruits, poultry and red meat in order to give her demanding clients a good and complete service. With the profits she will obtain from the store, she wants to help her husband with the household expenses (they have 2 daughters).

In order to start her project, Magdalena requests this loan that she will pay back in 6 months. Magdalena and her family look forward to your prompt answer.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

La pequeña pero muy surtida bodeguita de doña Magdalena es una de las más concurridas de su zona, anteriormente esta tiendita le pertenecía a su hermana mayor, quien por motivos de viaje se la traspasó, ahora ya con dos años de propietaria de este negocio desea ampliarlo mucho más para comercializar también verduras, frutas y carnes rojas y blancas. Ella tiene proyectado esta ampliación porque desea ofrecerles un buen y completo servicio a sus exigentes clientes, y con las ganancias que obtenga apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su familia que la conforman sus dos hijas, magdalena y su esposo. Para concretar su proyecto requiere adquirir un préstamo que se compromete a retornarlo en un lapso de seis meses. Magdalena y su familia esperan de corazón tu pronta respuesta.

loans.use: To increase the product offer of her grocery store, including buying and selling vegetables, fruits, poultry and red meat

loans.name: Francisco José

texts.es:
Francisco José B. is a native of the city of Bluefields. He is 48 years old and married to Socorro Urbina. They have 3 minor children who are enrolled in primary school. For more than 10 years, Mr. B. has been buying basic grains and dairy products from small local producers and supplying the owners of small package stores, who are his potential customers. With the growing demand for these products, Mr. B. needs to buy 2 short hundredweights of cheese at $96.00 for each short hundredweight, 50 pounds of cream at $0.80 a pound, 50 pairs of curd at $0.80 a pair and 28 pounds of butter at $1.00 a pound, so that he can supply other package stores.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer.

El Sr. Francisco José B. es originario de la ciudad de Bluefields, tiene 48 años de edad, esta casado con la Sra. Socorro Urbina ambos tienen 3 hijos menores de edad que cursan estudios primarios. El Sr. B. tiene mas de 10 años de comprar a los pequeños productores de las comunidades granos básicos y lácteos para poder abastecer a los dueños de las pulperías que son sus clientes potenciales con la creciente demanda de estos productos el Sr. B. necesita comprar 2 quintales de queso a $96.00 dólares cada quintal, 50 libras de crema a $ 0.80 centavos dólar la libra, 50 pares de cuajada a $ 0.80 centavos dólar el par de cuajada y 28 libras de mantequillas a $ 1.00 dólar la libra para poder abastecer a otras pulperías.

loans.use: Purchase cheese, cream, butter and  curd.

loans.name: Olinda

texts.es:
Its strategic location combined with the friendliness with which she tends her customers are the greatest strengths of Olinda's little grocery store. She is a young mother, just 24 years old, who decided last year to open her business with the unconditional support of her husband, José, who works in an auto mechanic's shop. She began offering a little merchandise, but as her earnings increased, she was able to expand, and currently this little shop is becoming one of the most shopped at stores. She is very proud to have achieved this in so short a time. This business is becoming the main income source of the family, and her dream is to expand it even more so that she can offer well being, security and comfort to her two small daughters and her hard-working husband. Olinda is waiting for your help.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

El lugar estratégico en el que está ubicado sumado a la amabilidad con la que atiende a sus clientes, son las principales fortalezas con las que cuenta la bodeguita de Olinda madre joven de 24 años de edad, que decidió abrir este negocio hace un año con el apoyo incondicional de su esposo, José, quien trabaja en un taller de mecánica automotriz. Inició ofreciendo poca mercadería, pero conforme iba obteniendo ganancias poco a poco la implementó, actualmente ésta bodeguita está convirtiéndose en una de las más concurridas, sintiéndose muy orgullosa por lo que esta logrando en corto tiempo. Este negocio está convirtiéndose en el ingreso económico principal de su familia y su deseo ti es implementarlo mucho más para ofrecerles bienestar, seguridad y comodidad a sus dos pequeñas niñas y a su laborioso esposo. Olinda espera tu ayuda.

loans.use:
Inyección de capital para la implementación de su pequeña bodega.
Cash for the expansion of her small grocery store.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es:
Natividad is a diligent woman who, after years of hard work and effort, finds herself proud of the growth of her pharmacy. She studied the technical degree of nursing, and her knowledge of medicine brought her to working at a recognized pharmacy in the city of Juliaca for many years. But when she saw that the wages they paid her were not enough to cover her personal expenses, and most importantly, for her to cover the expenses of her younger sister's schooling, she decided to invest her savings in opening her own pharmacy. Currently, this tiny pharmacy is giving her the opportunity to improve her economic situation, her quality of life, and that of her only little sister, Leída. This exemplary sister's wish is to continue improving her business, and to do this, she needs a loan that will let her fulfill her wish. She's committed to repaying the loan within six months. Grant her the opportunity to complete her goals.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Natividad es una diligente mujer que tras años de arduo esfuerzo y trabajo va contemplando orgullosa el crecimiento de su botica. Ella estudió la carrera técnica en enfermería, sus conocimientos sobre medicina la llevaron a trabajar durante muchos años en una reconocida farmacia de la ciudad de Juliaca, pero al ver que el sueldo que le pagaban era insuficiente para cubrir sus gastos personales y lo más importante para Natividad cubrir los gastos que le demandaban los estudios de su hermana menor, decidió invertir el dinero ahorrado que tenia en la apertura de su propia botica.Actualmente esta pequeña botica le está dando la oportunidad de mejorar su situación económica, su calidad de vida y la de su única hermanita menor Leída.El deseo de esta ejemplar hermana es implementar aún más su negocio; para eso requiere obtener un préstamo de dinero que le permitirá cumplir con su propósito y promete rembolsarlos en un lapso de seis meses.Concédele la oportunidad de cumplir su proyecto.

loans.use: Expand her sales radius through new merchandise

loans.name: Bárbara

texts.es:
Selling and renting the skirts and petticoats of traditional Peruvian garb is proving to be very profitable for Bárbara. She began the business five months ago, due to the fact that for many years, selling candies inside a school wasn't working out well. Her current occupation pleases her greatly, as it is allowing her to calmly educate her three younger children; Mrs. Bárbara's greatest yearning is to leave this legacy for their development and growth. To make this a reality, she needs a loan that will allow her to increase the amount of merchandise she offers. Your generous support will be very well invested in the hands of this noble mother.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

El negocio de venta y alquiler de polleras y enaguas le están resultando muy rentable a la señora Bárbara, inició este negocio hace cinco meses; debido a que durante muchos años la venta de golosinas al interior de un centro educativo no le resultaba favorable.Su ocupación actual con el que ahora se siente muy feliz, le está permitiendo educar tranquilamente a sus tres menores hijos ya que el anhelo más grande que tiene doña Bárbara es dejarles esta herencia para su desarrollo.Para concretar su propósito requiere obtener un préstamo de dinero que le permitirá aumentar la cantidad de la mercadería que oferta.Tu generoso apoyo será muy bien invertido en las manos de esta noble madre.

loans.use: Increase the amount of merchandise available to her customers

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia, a native of the province of Huancane, has lived for seven years in the city of Juliaca. During this time, she has been selling spare parts for three-wheelers and motorcycles, merchandise that she takes to the province of Carabaya - San Gabán for sale. While she has been involved in this work, her husband, René, works at a private business distributing milk. Between the two, they are trying to provide an education to their three small children, who have all responded very well to the sacrifices and struggles of their dear parents. Lida is considering increasing her supply of merchandise to strengthen her business and improve her family's economic situation. To make this project into reality, she is asking for a loan. Lidia greatly appreciates the opportunity that you provide her in making her small business grow.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Lidia natural de la provincia de Huancane, hace siete años viene radicando en la ciudad de Juliaca, tiempo en el que también viene ofertando repuestos de triciclos y motos, mercadería que lleva para su comercialización a la provincia de Carabaya - San Gabán, mientras ella se desenvuelve en esta labor su esposo, René, trabaja en una empresa privada de distribución de leche, entre los dos tratan de ofrecerles educación a sus tres menores hijos quienes responden muy bien a cada uno de los sacrificios y esfuerzos de sus queridos padres.Lidia considera que aumentando el volumen de mercadería fortalecerá su negocio y por ende mejorará su situación económica familiar, para concretar su proyecto solicita obtener un préstamo.Lidia agradece mucho la oportunidad que le brindas para acrecentar su pequeño negocio.

loans.use: Cash to consolidate her small bike parts store.

loans.name: Juanita Francisca's Group

texts.en:
Epifania, Estilista, and Juanita have been part of the community bank Arco Iris for the past 5, 6, and 1 years respectively. In their bank they have learned to be punctual and to save, and how to educate their children.

Epifania is 34 years old. She is married and has two children. She sells fruit from a cart in the Nery Garcia market of Ayacucho. Furthermore, for the last month Epifania has been running a grocery store out of her house. On the other hand, Estelista is 46 years old. She is a single mother and has one son. Estelista travels to different markets around the region where she buys grains, animals, cheese, and other products which she sells from the Nery Garcia market in Ayacucho.

Juanita, is 49 years old. She is divorced and has two children. Juanita travels to different markets around Ayacucho and sells fruits, vegetables, and food staples. From the markets she buys animals and cheeses, which she sells in the city of Ayacucho.

Together Epifania, Estilista, and Juanita need loans of 1000, 1000, and 800 soles ( 3 soles = $1), which they will use to buy rice, sugar, oil, shoe polish, batteries, balloons, soap, milk, tuna fish, pork, potatoes, and cheese.

They plan to use their savings to educate their children and improve their homes. Epifania, Estilista, and Juanita dream that their children will be professionals and have secure jobs. They also hope that their businesses will continue to grow and that they will be able to buy their own house.

loans.use: Together Epifania, Estilista, and Juanita need loans of 1000, 1000, and 800 soles ( 3 soles = $1), which they will use to buy rice, sugar, oil, shoe polish, batteries, balloons, soap, milk, tuna fish, pork, potatoes, and cheese.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther is a woman of 35, who works at selling clothing and also offers hairdressing services. She sells clothing at the Los Pozos market in the city of Santa Cruz de la Sierra, and the hairdressing services she offers at her own home, where she lives with her children since she is a single mother.

Esther has quite a bit of experience in the two lines of work she does. On the other hand, the competition in both businesses is quite high, but her senority and excellent treatment of her clients allows her to depend on steady customers who appreciate her good treatment and work.

The prices she offers are stable and vary according to the service, for example the clothing varies according to its quality and the season, and at the beauty salon, in general, the prices of the different services are standardized.

With this loan request she will buy larger quantities of clothing to supply her business and also buy some things she needs to equip the hairdressing salon. Esther will only have this credit and does not owe anyone, her credit history is good.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer.

Esther es una señora de 35 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de ropa y también ofrece servicios de peluquería. Esther vende ropa en el Mercado de Los Pozos en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de la Sierra y los servicios de peluquería los ofrece en su mismo domicilio, lugar donde vive sólo con sus hijos ya que s una madre soltera.

Esther tiene bastante experiencia en el los dos rubros que se desempeña, por otra parte en ambos negocios la competencia es bastante elevada, pero su antiguedad y su excelente trato a sus clientes le permite contar con demandantes fijos que aprecian su buen trato y desempeño.

Los precios que ella ofrece al mercado son estables y varian de acuerdo al servicio, por ejemplo en las prendas de vestir varia de acuerdo a la calidad y a la temporada y en la peluquería generalmente los precios de los diversos servicios de belleza son standar.

Con la presente solicitud ella adquirirá más cantidad de ropa para surtir su negocio y también comprara algunas cosas para equipar la peluquería. Actualmente Esther solo cuenta con este crédito y no garantiza a nadie, sus antecedentes crediticios son buenos.

loans.use: Working capital and build onto home.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia is an enterprising and hard-working mother. Her business selling children's clothing makes her very happy since, thanks to this job, she is able to propel her three adolescent children forward. She brings her wholesale merchandise from the city of Tacna and distributes them to the retailers at the San Jose plaza of Juliaca. She is a single mother and feels happy at seeing how much her children have achieved in their studies. Julia's desire is to acquire a greater volume of products for resale; she is sure that with this showing, her overall economic situation will improve, and in time, her children will even be able to attend the university. To make her dreams a reality, Julia is asking for a monetary loan, that in the hands of this exemplary mother will be very well invested.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Julia es una madre muy emprendedora y trabajadora, su negocio de venta de ropas para niños le viene generando mucha alegría porque gracias a este trabajo va impulsando sola a sus tres hijos adolescentes, ella trae su mercadería al por mayor de la ciudad de Tacna y los distribuye a los comerciantes de la plaza San José de la ciudad donde radica, Juliaca.Ella es madre soltera que y se siente feliz de ver como sus hijos han logrado mucho con sus estudios, el deseo de Julia es adquirir mayor volumen de productos para comercializarlos, confiá que con esta proyección su situación económica irá mejorando y así sus hijos dentro de poco tiempo podrán ir a la universidad.Para hacer realidad sus deseos Julia solicita un préstamo de dinero que en las manos de esta ejemplar madre será muy bien invertido.

loans.use: Acquire a greater amount of garments for resale.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es:
Mary Luz is a lovely 23-year-old mother. A few months ago, she decided to leave her hometown of Sandia and relocate to the city of Juliaca. Since then, she has worked in a bakery and as a carpentry assistant in order to obtain the financial resources necessary to provide her 1-year-old daughter, Zayumí, with well-being and comfort. In the home she was renting she met Vicki, a joyful and friendly woman who taught her how to create beautiful macramé handiwork. She is using her spare time to undertake this activity with great patience and dedication. It is allowing her to earn the extra money she needs to provide for her young daughter. Mary Luz would like to create her handiwork in large quantities, but this requires more raw materials. For this reason she is seeking your support by requesting a loan and investing in the life of this young and entrepreneurial mother.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer

Mary Luz es una amorosa madre de 23 años de edad, hace algunos meses decidió salir de su pueblo natal Sandia y radicar en la ciudad de Juliaca, desde entonces estuvo trabajando en una panadería y apoyando en una carpintería con el propósito de obtener recursos económicos para ofrecerle bienestar y comodidad a su pequeña niña Zayumí de 1 año de edad.En el domicilio que alquilada conoció a la señora Vicki mujer muy alegre y amable que le enseñó a realizar hermosos trabajos de manualidades en macramé, esta actividad que desempeña en sus horas libres con suma paciencia y dedicación le está permitiendo obtener ingresos económicos extras e indispensable para el bienestar de su pequeña hija.El deseo de Mary Luz es realizar estos trabajos en grandes cantidades, para eso requiere obtener materia prima, con ese fin recurre a tu generosidad y hace la petición de un préstamo que será invertido en las manos de esta joven y emprendedora madre.

loans.use: Increase capital to purchase raw materials for creating a larger quantity of her beautiful handiwork

loans.name: Noemi's Group

texts.en:
Noemi and Getrudes have been members of the community bank Arco Iris for three years and four months respectively. They both are very happy to be part of their bank. They have received many lessons that help them improve their day-to-day life, such as how to educate their children, make a budget for their homes, and save.

Noemi is 36 years old and is married with four children. Twice a week she travels to different towns to buy grains, cheeses, and animals, which she later sells in Ayacucho. Twice a month she sends grains to the more distant town of Cañete.

Meanwhile, Getrudes is also 36 years old. She is married and has 7 children. For the past three months Getrudes has been traveling to different markets and buying grains and animals which she sells from a cart in the Chorro market of Ayacucho. Before this she sold food from a mobile cart but decided to switch in order to make more money.

Noemi and Getrudes need loans of 600 and 800 soles (3 soles = $1), which they will invest in buying corn, wheat, peas, cheese, chickens, and sheep. They plan to use their savings to educate their children and build a house. Noemi and Getrudes dream of owning a home where they can run their businesses, and educating their children so that they can become professionals.

loans.use: Noemi and Getrudes need loans of 600 and 800 soles (3 soles = $1), which they will invest in buying corn, wheat, peas, cheese, chickens, and sheep.

loans.name: Bacilia Yeny

texts.es:
We find Yeny and her younger brother in their small but cozy workshop eagerly knitting a large variety of colorful “chullos” (knit caps typical of the Andean region), gloves and hats. They begin knitting their gorgeous and distinctive textiles at 7:00 in the morning and finish at 6:00 in the evening. They later sell them wholesale at the Laguna Temporal market in the city of Juliaca. Thanks to the high-quality materials that they work with and their fine finishes, they have received a large amount of orders. For this reason, Yeny, a young 24-year-old mother, would like to turn her textile workshop into one of the largest and most sought-after in the city. She is seeking your support in this endeavor by requesting a monetary loan, which she will invest in the purchase of an immense variety of colored wools that she will use to continue knitting her distinctive fashions.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer

En su pequeño pero acogedor taller encontramos a Yeny y a su hermano menor confeccionando afanosamente gran variedad y coloridos chullos, guantes y boinas. Ellos inician la confección de sus hermosos y destacados tejidos desde las 7:00 de la mañana hasta las 6:00 de la tarde, para luego venderlos al por mayor en el mercado laguna temporal de la ciudad de Juliaca; gracias al excelente material con la que trabajan y a sus finos acabados les está permitiendo obtener gran cantidad de solicitudes, es por esa razón que Yeny joven madre de 24 años de edad desea convertir su taller de tejidos en uno de los más grande y solicitados de su ciudad.En esta oportunidad recurre a vuestra ayuda con el fin de obtener un préstamo de dinero que los invertirá en adquirir una inmensa variedad de coloridas lanas, para seguir tejiendo sus destacadas prendas.

loans.use: Increase capital to purchase greater quantities of dyed wool

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
Hugo is very pleased with what he's been able to achieve through his business of buying and selling lambswool. He learned and inherited this trade from his parents, who were very successful in the field. Hugo buys his merchandise at street fairs in small towns like Tiquillaca, Vilquechico, Mañazo, etc. After reaching a considerable volume, he sells it in bulk to a textile company, which earns him a decent profit. Hugo did not have a chance to have his own family, but that void has been filled by his adorable nephews, for whom he has special affection, and he would like to support them in obtaining their higher education. He is seeking a loan to purchase larger quantities of lambswool in order to increase his earnings. Hugo hopes to receive your support.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer

Hugo, se siente muy feliz por lo que está logrando conseguir con su negocio de compra y venta de lana de oveja. Esta actividad la aprendió y heredó de sus padres, quienes fueron los mejores comerciantes en este rubro. Hugo compra su mercadería en las ferias de los pueblitos de Tiquillaca, Vilquechico, Mañazo, etc. y luego de albergar un considerable volumen las vende por grandes cantidades a una empresa textil por lo que obtiene buenas ganancias.Hugo no tuvo la oportunidad de formar su familia, pero ese vació lo llenan sus adorables sobrinos por quienes siente un cariño especial y desea apoyarlos con sus estudios superiores. Solicita un préstamo para poder comprar mayor cantidad a fin de incrementar sus ganancias.Hugo en este momento espera por vuestro apoyo.

loans.use: Purchase of larger quantities of wool

loans.name: Basilia

texts.en:
Basilia has belonged to the community bank Señor D. Huanca for eight months. She mentioned that in the bank she has learned to save, to be responsible, how to manage money, and about good nutrition.

Basilia is 48 years old. She is married and has seven children. Basilia owns a bakery where she makes a variety of breads. For the past five years Basilia has worked together with her children and husband to make the business successful. She and her husband started out as employees in another bakery but little by little were able to open their own store. They sell their bread from their house and at a variety of markets in the towns of Putaja and Tambo Cucho.

Basilia needs a loan of 2600 soles (3 soles = $1), which she will invest in buying flour, butter, and yeast. Basilia will use her savings to build a house out of more durable materials. Her dream is that her business will continue to grow and that her children will be professionals.

loans.use: Basilia needs a loan of 2600 soles (3 soles = $1), which she will invest in buying flour, butter, and yeast.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
From a very young age, Aydee learnt to work and to develop her skills in the fruit-selling business as best as she could. Now married with three children, she has not stopped her continued dedication to her work buying and selling fruits, as well as teaching her children the responsibilities of the job and the tricks of the trade. The children of Aydee undoubtedly have new perspectives concerning their personal development and want to secure a profession in order to help their dear mother.

For this reason she is asking for a loan in order to increase production and marketing with the aim of realising her children’s dreams. We are counting on your help.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Aydee, desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar y a desenvolverse adecuadamente en el negocio de la venta de frutas y es lo que mejor puede hacer. Ahora casada y con tres hijos, no deja de seguir dedicándose a su trabajo de compra y venta de frutas y enseña a sus hijos los gajes de este oficio y el manejo de toda esta comercialización.Sin duda los hijos de Aydee tienen nuevas perspectivas para su desarrollo como personas y desean alcanzar una profesión y ayudar a su querida madre.

Por esa razón solicita un préstamo para aumentar su producción y comercialización con el fin concretar los sueños de sus hijos, contamos con vuestra ayuda

.

loans.use: Injection of capital in order to improve sales

loans.name: Justa Justina

texts.es:
Justa V. is dedicated to her economic activity which is the sale of vegetables, having had her business for the past 33 years. It was started up with her own saving and those of her husband. Her vegetable-selling business started in Leon, in the market in the area outside the bus station. However, later she requested a space inside for her business and this was granted to her without any problem.

Justa V. is a married lady with 3 children and, together with her husband, they struggle to help them get ahead in their studies at primary and secondary levels.

We cannot omit that Justa V. has benefited for the past three years from Ceprodel, who has helped her out with financing, granting her 20 credits up to now. These have helped her buy vegetables and additionally have helped her pay for her children´s studies.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Justa V. se dedica a su actividad económica que es la venta de verduras teniendo su negocio desde hace 33 años que dio inicio con sus propios ahorros y los de su esposo. Su negocio de venta de verduras lo inicia en León ubicándose en el mercado la Estación en las afueras, sin embargo mas adelante solicita un puesto para su negocio y se le fue otorgado sin ningún problema.

Justa V. es una dama casada y con 3 hijos que junto a su esposo luchan para sacarlos adelante en su proceso de estudio en niveles de primaria y secundaria.

No podemos omitir que la señora Justa Vasquez ha sido beneficiada desde hace tres años por Ceprodel quien le asistió con financiamiento otorgándole 20 créditos hasta el momento de los cuales le han beneficiado para la compra de las verduras y además le han ayudado para pagar los estudios de sus hijos.

loans.use: Purchase vegetables.

loans.name: Calixto

texts.es:
Calixto is 49 years old. He hasn’t found the love of his life yet and so is still single: his work helps him to obtain personal satisfactions and in spite of not being able to share this with a family, he has the affection and love of his brothers and sisters, whom he helps with the little which he obtains from his work in the papaya fields and from his hard labour as a moto-taxi driver. Thanks to his occupation in the fields, he has acquired this motorcycle which has helped him to increase his income.

Calixto wants to build a house and to buy manure and fertiliser for his lands, and so he has asked that we offer our help to ensure better-quality harvests and to bring the day when he has his own house closer. Let us realise his request, so that Calixto can soon enjoy a secure and comfortable space.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Calixto a sus 49 años, no ha podido encontrar al amor de su vida y se quedo solo; su trabajo lo ayuda a obtener satisfacciones personales y a pesar de no poder compartirlo con una familia tiene el cariño y amor de sus hermanos y hermanas, a quienes ayuda con lo poco que obtiene de su trabajo en la chacra de papayas y de la ardua labor de mototaxista.Gracias a su desempeño en los terrenos de cultivo ha adquirido esta moto que lo ayuda a incrementar sus ingresos.

Él desea construir su casa y comprar abonos para sus terrenos y solicita le podamos extender nuestra ayuda para hacer de sus cosechas las de mejor calidad y hacer cercano el día de poder tener una casa propia .Posibilitemos su petición para que pronto Calixto, goce de un espacio cómodo y seguro.

loans.use: Purchase better seeds, manure and fertilizer

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
Bertha is already elderly, but despite her age she hasn’t lost her drive and enthusiasm for work: her single state, without a companion obliges her to dedicate her effort to the food-sales she undertakes every afternoon, offering delicious “chipados”, a typical dish from the jungle that Bertha prepares expertly. Every afternoon from five in the evening, she sits herself in front of her “vicariita” which is a small wooden stove, where she prepares these little dishes.

Up until now Bertha has managed to survive with the income from selling this typical dish. However now the aches and pain of old age are limiting her ability to continue her work with the same rhythm to which she was accustomed.

She is asking for a sum of money in order to liven-up her house into a small restaurant where she will be able to sell her dishes without having to spend time walking through the streets. With your help Bertha will continue working and ill be able to buy some medicines or vitamins in order to improve her health.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Bertha, es ya anciana, pero a pesar D. su edad no a perdido el ímpetu y empeño por el trabajo, el estar sola sin compañía alguna la obliga a dedicarse con más esmero en la venta D. comida que realiza todas las tardes, ofreciendo los ricos y deliciosos chipados que es una plato típico D. la selva y que Bertha prepara deliciosamente.Todas las tardes a partir D. las cinco D. la tarD., ella se sienta en su vicariíta, que es una pequeña cocina a leña, donD. prepara estos platillos.

Hasta hoy Bertha ha podido sobrevivir con la venta D. sus paltos típicos; sin embargo ahora los malestares propios D. su edad la limitan a desempeñarse con el ritmo D. trabajo a la que estaba acostumbrada.

Solicita una suma D. dinero para ambientar su casita como un restaurante pequeño donD. pueda vender sus patillos y dejar D. recorrer las calles ofertándolos.Con vuestro apoyo Bertha seguirá trabajando y podrá comprarse algunos medicamentos o vitaminas para mejorar su salud.

loans.use: Renovation of her small home so she can sell her delicious "CHIPADOS" from this comfortable place.

loans.name: Nícida

texts.es:
Every day beginning at 5 in the evening Nicida goes out to sell her delicious kebabs (meat skewers) in the main square or other places where people gather, as she take good advantage of every opportunity that come her way. Like all mothers, she wishes to provide her family with a comfortable and dignified life and the efforts of her work are dedicated to the members of her home.

Now she has new projects in mind: with the sale of fuel being the nearest to realization, as she only needs a sum of money to complete her establishment of this business. But for this to happen needs people like you, who can offer her a friendly hand and make her dream into reality.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Todos los días a partir de las cinco de la tarde Nícida sale a vender sus riquísimos anticuchos a la plaza de su comunidad o a los lugares donde se conglomeran las personas ya que cada oportunidad es muy bien aprovechada por ella. Ella al igual que todas las madres desea ofrecer a su familia una vida cómoda y digna y el esfuerzo de su desempeño se lo debe a los miembros de su hogar.

Ahora tiene nuevos proyectos por realizar y la venta de combustible es el que más próximo a concretarse, sólo requiere de una suma de dinero para terminar de establecer su negocio pero sin duda necesita de personas como usted que le puedan tender una mano amiga y hacer realidad su deseo.

loans.use: Injection of capital to establish a small sales space in her home from which to sell fuel.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario is a 63 year-old gentleman who works in transportation. His wife has a grocery business and they also make bread which they sell in their grocery business.

Mario and his wife have two children who are 22 and 20 years old respectively and who live with their parents. Both have more than 11 years experience in the activities that they carry out to help the family economically.

The competition in both lines of work is average, as there are also other stores in the neighborhood and also demand for drivers, but the risk from competition lessens because they have so many years of experience and knowledge in their respective lines of work.

This current loan request will be for working capital for the grocery business of his wife; the prices of products vary depending on the type of product and where it comes from, etc. The credit history of Mario and his wife is good, and no other debts are reported in the financial system.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer.

Mario es un señor de 63 años de edad que se dedica al transporte y por otra parte su esposa cuenta con un negocio de abarrotes, paralelamente también elaboran pan para comercializarlo en su negocio de abarrotes. Mario y su esposa cuentan con dos hijos de 22 y 20 años de edad respectivamente, actualmente ambos jovenes viven con sus padres. Ambos tienen una experienci de más de 11 años en todas las actividades que desmpeñan para ayudar económicamente a la familia.

La competencia en ambos rubro es media ya que también hay otras tiendas de barrio por el lugar y también hay demanda de transportistas, pero el riesgo de la competencia disminuye al tener tantos años de experiencia y conocimiento de los respectivos rubros.

La presente solicitud será destinada como capital de trabajo en el negocio de abarrotes de la esposa, los precios de los productos varian dependiendo del tipo de producto, de su procedencia, etc. La experiencia crediticia de Mario y su esposa es buena ya que no reportan otras deudas en el sistema financiero.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Silvia Irene

texts.es:
Silvia C. is a lady who started her business selling vegetables 16 years ago, with a small amount of working capital from her husband. The need which Mrs. C. faces is that she is the mother of four school-age children, and her work does not provide enough for all the household expenses nor to support her little ones. This is the reason that day after day she makes her best effort to try to survive, as she is now a single mother and does not receive any financial support.

In spite of her situation, she has received credits from Ceprodel, which have benefited her to the extent that her sales have improved satisfactorily and in addition, even though she is in a difficult situation, she has been able to maintain her family.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer.

Silvia C. es una dama que inicia su negocio de venta de verduras hace 16 años con un pequeño capital de trabajo producto del apoyo de su esposo. La necesidad por la que atraviesa la señora C. es que por ser madre de cuatro hijos en edad escolar el trabajo que desempeña no le cubre con los gastos del hogar ni para mantener a sus pequeños. Por este motivo es que día a día hace sus mejores esfuerzos posibles para tratar de sobrevivir ya que es madre soltera y no recibe apoyo financiero de alguien en especifico.

A pesar de la situación que atraviesa, ha realizado créditos con Ceprodel los cuales le han beneficiado de manera que sus ventas han venido mejorando satisfactoriamente y además aun en medio de su difícil situación ha logrado mantener su núcleo familiar.

loans.use: Purchase vegetables for her business.

loans.name: Elonia

texts.es:
Elonia, with a lot of effort, managed to open a grocery store in her humble dwelling and the business is doing well: as a result of her daily efforts she has been able to meet the demands of her customers and as result of being located in a busy transit zone the demand for her products has been increasing. She is a little worried that she will be unable to take advantage of this opportunity, because she needs a sum of money to use as capital investment in order to satisfy her customers’ requests.

At the same time, she would like to finish the construction of her small house in order that her children can have better home-comforts and a environment that encourages their positive development. The combination of these facts has motivated Elonia to present her request for a loan with the objective of realising these projects. Don’t forget she’s counting on you!

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Elonia, con mucho esfuerzo aperturó una bodega en su humilde morada le va muy bien; con su desempeño diario ha podido percibir la demanda de las personas y por estar situada en una zona de amplia concurrencia la demanda de sus artículos se han ido incrementando; está un poco preocupada debido a que no le gustaría desaprovechar esta oportunidad, sin embargo requiere de una suma de dinero como capital de inversión para satisfacer las solicitudes de sus clientes.

Así mismo desea terminar la construcción de su casita para que sus hijos puedan tener mayores comodidades y ambientes favorables para su desarrollo.La suma de estos hechos ha motivado a Elonia a presentar su petición de un préstamo con el objetivo de realizar sus proyectos pensados no olvide que cuenta con usted.

loans.use: Inrease in capital in order to acquire larger quantity and better variety of essential goods.

loans.name: Eudeslinda

texts.es:
Eudeslinda devotes herself to the production of fruit on her farmlands: for this reason she remains as long as possible on her lands, dedicating herself to the care and fertilisation of her fields: with all this effort it is possible to obtain a good harvest and sell the products, with the aim of offering her two children an education and personal development appropriate to their age. This hard work also prompts her to think of opening a grocery store in her house and thus providing a larger share of income for the family’s kitty.

However this will require a larger investment, and so with this object in mind she is asking for your help in order to obtain the amount asked for to invest in the purchase of a larger quantity of manure and fertilizer. We hope to count on you, and appeal to your collaborative spirit.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Eudeslinda, se dedica a L. producción D. frutas en sus tierras D. cultivo, por esa razón permanece el mayor tiempo posible en este lugar dedicándose al cuidado y abonando sus terrenos; todo este esfuerzo para poder obtener una buena cosecha y venta D. sus productos con el fin D. ofrecer a sus dos hijos una educación y desarrollo acorD. a su edad. El esfuerzo también está apuntado a abrir una bodega en su casita y proporcionar mayores ingresos a su canasta familiar.

Sin embargo esto requiere D. mayor inversión; con este objetivo en mente solicita vuestro apoyo a fin D. obtener L. cantidad que solicita para invertirlos en L. compra D. mayor cantidad D. abonos y fertilizantes.Esperamos contar con usted apelando a su alma colaboradora.

loans.use: Purhase a larger quantity of manure and fertilizer in order to improve the products from his fields.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria buys and sells fruit. Her work consists of purchasing large quantities of fruit to later transport to her warehouse or to other vendors for transport to other comercial locales such as Huancayo and Lima. Every morning, very early in the morning, she selects and packages the fruit with the help of her husband and children whenever they have free time, trying to help their mother whenever possible. Gloria needs more capital funds to stimulate the growth of her investment and obtain greater earnings, for savings and to build a house. She seeks a sum of money as a loan that we are sure you will be able to help with.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Gloria, se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas; su trabajo consiste en comprar a las personas de la chacra una gran cantidad de frutas para luego transportarlos a su bodega o depósito donde los encajonan y los venden a las personas que transportan frutas a las ciudades más comerciales como Huancayo y Lima.Todas las mañanas desde muy temprano tiene que seleccionar las frutas y encajonarlas labor que realiza con la ayuda de su pareja e hijos quienes en los tiempos libres tratan de ayudar a su madre en lo posible.Gloria requiere de mayor capital para aumentar su inversión en la compra de frutas y por ende aumentar sus ganancias y ahorrar para la construcción de su casita y mejora de sus ambientes.Solicita una suma de dinero en préstamo que estamos seguros usted podrá proporcionárselos.

loans.use: An injection of Capital funds to stimulate growth of the investment and obtain greater earnings.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma is a happy worker running a warehouse covering a large territory in her community. At the root of her financial problems is that her business failed and had to close it down temporarily. Nevertheless she has not lost hope of restarting her warehouse and making ti the best in her community once again. Due to the lack of capital funds to restock her small warehouse, fo now she works as a farm laborer and sells a few consumer items that she has in her warehouse, just so that her little ones may not have to leave school. With this wish in mind she requests your noble and generous help from her heart, in the form of a sum of money as a loan with the intention to invest it in the purchase of better and larger quantities of products. With these she will once again win the place she once had in her community and by these means help raise her family's standard of living. Only with your help this will be possible.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

NORMA, una alegre bodeguera que hasta hace un tiempo tenia una gran cobertura en su comunidad, a raíz de sus problemas económicos su negocio quebró y tuvieron que cerrarlo momentáneamente; sin embargo ella no pierde la esperanza de hacer de su bodega la mejor de su comunidad una vez más.Debido a la falta de capital para reflotar su pequeña bodega por ahora se dedica a la labor agrícola y a vender los pocos productos de consumo que tiene en su bodega para evitar que sus pequeños hijos abandonen la escuela.Con este deseo en mente solicita la ayuda de vuestro noble y bondadoso corazón con una suma de dinero en calidad de préstamo a fin de invertirlo en la compra de mayor y mejor calidad de productos para poseer una vez la aceptación de su comunidad y por ende elevar su nivel de vida familiar.Solo con su apoyo lo podrá lograr.

loans.use: Investment of capital funds to acquire better and greater quantities of products to restock her small warehouse.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
Prof. Mery dedicates her time in the running of her corner store selling items and cold drinks to her community and she also works as a very good teacher, loved by her community. She is a very good business woman and she is dedicated to her work and gives fine customer service to the public. Given this demand Mery does not have sufficient funds to purchase products and merchandise and the few funds she does have from her work as a teacher she uses to cover her own living expenses. For this reason she is requesting your help to replenish and expand her business. You will be happy to share in the happiness of this devoted teacher, in her work, in her labor, for the benefit of her community.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

La profesora MERY, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y bebidas heladas en su comunidad y aparte de ser una muy buena maestra y querida en la comunidad es una muy buena bodeguera dedicada a su trabajo y a dar una muy buena atención al público.Pese a esta demanda Mery no posee el dinero suficiente para la compra de sus productos y mercadería y el poco dinero que gana en el magisterio solo le ayuda a cubrir sus gastos propios; es por ello que solicita su colaboración para surtir su negocio y ampliarlo.No puede negarse a poder ser parte de la alegría de una maestra comprometida con su labor y el trabajo en beneficio de su comunidad.

loans.use: Inyección de capital para adquirir mayor y mejor calidad de productos para su bodega.  Influx of capital funds to acquire better and greater quantity of products for her warehouse.

loans.name: Miranda

texts.es:
E. goes out every evening to sell her delicious and appetizing food at affordable prices to the people of her community most in need. As you can see this very hard working mother has been able to help herself with her business, and has also helped many single mothers by being able to provide them with good and delicious food at very low cost. She has her small business in a very far corner of the downtown core where you can find the poorest and neediest people. But she is requesting help so that she can keep up her small business because it has been targeted by crime. She wishes to have help in the form of a loan so that she can furnish her small business with tables and chairs for her clientele. Please help this noble person, she that works for her own good, and that of her fellow man.

Tranlsated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

E., miranda todas las noches sale a vender sus deliciosos y apetecibles platos de comida a precios muy cómodos y al alcance de las personas más necesitadas, como puede ver esta trabajadora madre ha hecho de su negocio una gran ayuda económica para su casa y la de muchas madres solteras que gracias que E. pueden obtener un plato de comida delicioso y a muy bajo precio. Tiene instalado su puesto de comida en una de las zonas más alejadas de la plaza principal donde podemos encontrar a personas muy pobres y necesitadas.Pero ahora ella solicita le ayudemos a seguir con su pequeño negocio el cual se ha visto perjudicado por la delincuencia, y desea le podamos ayudar con un préstamo para implementar su local con algunas bancas y mesas para el público que acude en su búsqueda.Ayudemos a esta noble persona que trabajo para su beneficio y el de su prójimo.

loans.use: To purchase tables and chairs to furnish her small business.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosal is an engaging woman that as a young person she dedicated herself to the sales of natural products and today works with a world-renouned TIENS trademark and has seen great personal satisfaction with which she has been able to see her investment turn into a house and an income. But times always change and needs are increasing and she sees these needs especially in her growing children. This is Rosa's motivation to seek out a loan, so that she will be able to offer a greater variety of natural products to her clients. With this in mind she is seeking your support in order to make her business run. You help Rosa find what she needs to overcome obstacles when times are difficult of her family.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Rosa, es una mujer emprendedora que desde muy joven se dedicó a la venta de productos naturales y hoy trabaja con una marca mundial TIENS que le ha dado grandes satisfacciones personales en poco tiempo de intervención y gracias a esta nueva ocupación tiene una casita y puede mantener su hogar.Pero como siempre los tiempos van cambiando y las necesidades van en aumento y esto se ve mayormente marcado por las necesidades de los hijos quienes al ir creciendo demandan mayores atenciones. Este es el motivo principal por el cual Rosa necesita acrecentar su negocio y ofrecer mayores cantidades de productos naturales; con este propósito en mente solicita vuestro apoyo a fin de obtener la cantidad que solicita para poner en marcha su propósito. Usted puede hacer que Rosa encuentre un gran colaborador que le ayude a superar los momentos más difíciles y duros de su familia.

loans.use: Influx of capital funds to stimulate growth of her business and increase her earnings.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
Maria is an elderly woman, but in her smile you can still see a sweet young woman with great dreams of prosperity and hopes of making tomorrow a better day. She is making this happy with an opportunity that was given her by a company producing natural products names Tiens. It's been more than a year that she has been working in these sale of these natural products for individuals suffering from general aches and pains, a product that she personally recommends given her experience with the products. This business brings great earnings but it requires a large investment in time, which is why she requires an important influx of capital to acquire greater quantities of orders and products to furnish them, an opportunity to improve her financial situation. She wishes to increase her investment so that she can bring her products to some aboriginal communities and near-by cities. Please help this hard working woman to earn a better life for herself, and improve the health of others as well.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

María, es una dama de avanzada edad, que en su semblante aún tiene la sonrisa de una dulce jovencita que tiene muchos deseos de prosperar y hacer del mañana un momento más agradable y lo esta logrando gracias a la oportunidad que le brindaron en la empresa de productos naturales Tiens.Hace más de un año viene trabajando en la venta de productos naturales que ofrece a las personas con dolencias y malestares generales, que recomienda personalmente debido a que dichos productos le han ayudado a recuperarse de su estado de salud y los malestares propios de su edad.Sin embargo esta labor trae muchas ganancias pero toma tiempo, debido a que requiere de una importante suma de dinero como capital de inversión para acopiar mayor cantidad de pedidos y productos que hasta la fecha a Maria le han dado la oportunidad de mejorar su situación económica. Tiene el deseo de incrementar su inversión para llevar sus productos a algunas comunidades nativas y ciudades cercanas..Colabore con esta emprendedora mujer que se gana la vida mejorando la salud de los demás

loans.use: Influx of capital funds to increase her inventory and sales territory.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma had to leave her hometown eight years ago. She installed a storage at her new home, which continues to grow and improve until today thanks to her efforts and the support from her partner and children. Thanks to their dedication and commitment they have been able to expand their grocery business to include other consumption products. Their new project is to establish a guest house which they will call "Carlitos". Their dream is to make it the busiest and best one around.

They can only make this happen with an additional income which will help them equip the rooms with all the necessary services in order to attend to their clients' with the highest quality. Therefore, Vilma is requesting a loan to cover these expenses and requests your collaboration for this costly project which Vilma's family wishes to complete.

Translated from Spanish by Yael Schwartzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Vilma, hace ocho años tuvo que dejar su tierra natal e instalar una bodega en su nuevo domicilio, el cual hasta la fecha ha ido creciendo y mejorando gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su pareja e hijos. Gracias a la dedicación y entrega por el trabajo hoy han logrado ampliar su negocio de abarrotes con otros productos de consumo.Ahora tienen nuevos proyectos que consolidar como el de establecer su hospedaje al cual llamará, Carlitos, con el afán de convertirlo en el más concurrido y el mejor de su zona; este plan sólo podrán realizarlo con un capital adicional que les permitirá ambientar los ambientes con todos los servicios que requiere y necesita un lugar como estos para una atención de calidad a los clientes.Motivo por el cual, Vilma, solicita una suma de dinero en calidad de préstamo para cubrir con los requerimientos que le hacen falta en su hospedaje y solicita vuestra colaboración para tan costoso proyecto que la familia de Vilma desea lograr concluir.

loans.use: Invest capital in the equipment of her new "Carlitos" guesthouse

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silva is a valued mother who makes a daily effort to ensure that the needs of her three sons are met. Her husband also works hard to support the family. She sales sweets and ice cream from her home, which does not look like a store, but is well known because of the quality of her product.  She also gets financial help from renting out her car. However, despite these businesses, she is not able to open a store due to the expenses of having a family. Now, Silvia is asking for a loan so that she can buy everything necessary to open her own store in the future.  Please help her to achieve her dream.

loans.use: Upgrades of store

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina is 45 years old and sells cattle in the Villa Verde market. She had four children - one is 16 years old and studies, another is 19 and drives a motorcycle taxi, another is 21 and is studying and the oldest is 23 and helps his mother in the livestock business.

The business consists of buying and selling cattle. The purchases are made in the small villages near Montero and later the livestock is sold at the Villa Verde market. Alejandrina has 4 years of experience in this type of business. There is average competition in the business, but Alejandrina has some steady customers in the market who buy livestock. The prices vary according to the animal´s weight, as far as pigs, the prices also vary according to the weight.

This loan request is Alejandrina´s fifth with our institution, during which time she has demonstrated an excellent repayment record.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer.

Alejandrina es una señora de 45 años de edad que se dedica al comercio de ganado vacuno en el mercado de Villa Verde. Alejandrina tiene cuatro hijos, uno de 16 años que actualmente estudia, el otro de 19 años de edad es transportista de mototaxi, el de 21 años de edad está estudiando y por último el de 23 años de edad le ayuda a su madre en el negocio del ganado.

El negocio consiste en comprar y vender ganado vacuno, la compra la realiza en las poblaciones cercanas a Montero y posteriormente vende el ganado en el Mercado de Villa Verde, Alejandrina tiene 4 años de experiencia en este tipo de negocio. Existe competencia en un nivel medio, pero Alejandrina cuenta con clientes fijos en dicho mercado que adquieren el ganado. Los precios de los mismos varian según el peso del animal, en cuanto al ganado porcino los precios también varian de acuerdo al peso.

Esta solicitud es la quinta de Alejandrina con nuestra institución, tiempo en el que demostró tener un excelente cumplimiento de pagos.

loans.use: Buy livestock (cows and pigs).

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia, with great happiness and excitement dedicates her time to selling videos and equipment for modest prices in her small kiosk. Each item she sells is brought from the city of Lima and has had much success over the last 8 years in this activity. Despite the efforts she makes daily along side her husband, this hasn’t been sufficient to cover the costs of her children much less make any home improvements. Cecilia wishes to acquire more small well-known, name-brand appliances to increase her income. We are sure that with your help she will be able to accomplish her goals.

Translated from Spanish by Gabriel Santamaria, Kiva Volunteer.

Cecilia, con gran ímpetu y alegría dedica su tiempo a ofertar artefactos y videos en su pequeño puesto a precios módicos, cada uno de los bienes que vende son traídos desde la ciudad de Lima y hace ocho se dedica a esta actividad con mucho éxito. Pero pese al esfuerzo que día a día realiza Cecilia a lado de su esposo, este no ha sido suficiente para solventar los gastos de sus hijos y mucho menos para poder ambientar su casita y mejorar los ambientes de su hogar.Cecilia desea adquirir mayor cantidad de electrodomésticos de marcas reconocidas a fin de aumentar sus ingresos. Estamos seguros de que con vuestra ayuda podrá cristalizar sus propósitos.
